titleStmt.title: An Impartial account of the late discovery of the persons taken with fire-balls in Southwark and the circumstances attending what materially happened during their being in custody and confession before the justice of peace, with many other matters relating to that dreadful occasion.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and creased, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
